subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Prototype Auto Tune Recording
author: RetroCom
full_text:
It was one of the reasons I chose the RCA to work with, the afc being off makes a big diffrence. 

Dave
--- franks-boxes@... wrote:

From: Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...>
To: <evp-itc@yahoogroups.com>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Prototype Auto Tune Recording
Date: Wed, 31 Oct 2007 10:22:26 -0600


NOOOOoooooo! not a Super Radio! That's sacred! Just kidding---sorta. Anyway the voice is pretty clear--good job!
 
 I think the chip I'm using has built in AFC, and no way to disable it, so FM scannning doesn't sound too good, but AM makes up for it.
 
 Frank-S
